file.title: Split count

p.text: Is used to know into how many parts the text can be split when its parts are divided by a symbol or a line. For example, if to split the text "Hi! How do you do?" into parts with "!" as a splitter then the text will be split into "Hi" and "How do you do?" and the command will return the number of parts - "2".
p.textAll: If you want to get some part of the text then use the command _Split.

file.seealso:
